programme.title: The Notorious Bettie Page
programme.desc: Biopic of the iconic 1950s pin-up, starring Gretchen Mol. God-fearing Nashville girl Bettie Page swaps her conservative home for the bright lights of New York, hoping to find fame as an actress. Instead, she makes it big in a saucily different way, becoming one of the most iconic fetish models ever Mary Harron - Director Gretchen Mol - Bettie Page Chris Bauer - Irving Klaw Jared Harris - John Willie Sarah Paulson - Bunny Yeager Cara Seymour - Maxie David Strathairn - Estes Kefauver Lili Taylor - Paula Klaw Jonathan M Woodward - Marvin Austin Pendleton - Teacher Norman Reedus - Billy Neal.

programme.title: Carmen & Lola
programme.desc: After two Roma women's lives collide in the suburbs of Madrid, they are forced to make a difficult choice between community and love. programme.title: Summerland
programme.desc: Alice is a reclusive writer, resigned to a solitary life on the seaside cliffs of southern England while the Second World War rages across the Channel. When she opens her front door one day to find she has to adopt a young London evacuee named Frank, she's resistant. It's not long, however, before the two realise they have more in common in their pasts than Alice had assumed. Romantic drama, starring Gemma Arterton, Gugu Mbatha-Raw and Tom Courtenay Jessica Swale - Director Gemma Arterton - Alice Gugu Mbatha-Raw - Vera Lucas Bond - Frank Penelope Wilton - Older Alice Tom Courtenay - Mr Sullivan Dixie Egerickx - Edie.

programme.desc: Isolated on a remote property after her mother's death, 16-year-old Claudia finds her world transformed when spirited teenager Grace appears. programme.title: Book of Love
programme.desc: Young, uptight and unsuccessful English writer Henry's latest novel sells poorly. But when the book suddenly becomes a surprise hit in Mexico, his publicist insists he travel there on a promotional tour. Upon arrival, a confused Henry discovers the reason behind the popularity - Mexican translator Maria has rewritten the dull book as a steamy erotic story. A furious Henry and reluctant Maria must now travel together on a book tour across Mexico. As tempers flair and sparks fly, the two begin to find love. Romantic comedy, starring Sam Claflin and Veronica Echegui Robert Shaye - Director Robert Shaye - Director.

programme.title: Adult Life Skills
programme.desc: A woman returns to her home town to live in a shed belonging to her mother, who grows frustrated as her daughter regresses to childhood. A friendship develops between the directionless woman and a troubled young boy, which gives her the push she needs to develop a more independent outlook on life. programme.desc: Science-fiction adventure starring William Shatner, Leonard Nimoy and DeForest Kelley. In the 23rd century, Captain Kirk and his intrepid band of space travellers discover a probe in the vicinity of Earth that is trying to contact a humpback whale, a species that is extinct. programme.desc: OJ Haywood and sister Emerald inherit the family's California ranch from their father, who is killed by debris falling from the sky. programme.title: The Canterville Ghost
programme.sub-title: Action, Fantasy, Drama, Animation, Comedy ║ 2023 ║ PG
programme.desc: According to legend, Sir Simon de Canterville drowned his wife Lady Eleanor in the lake of Canterville Chase and for hundreds of years the nobleman's ghost has been cursed to haunt the manor. American patriarch Hiram B Otis moves from Boston into the country pile with his clan. Daughter Virginia makes her displeasure about the move clear and she forges a pact with Sir Simon to scare her parents back to America. programme.title: The King's Speech
programme.desc: Oscar-winning historical drama starring Colin Firth, Helena Bonham Carter and Geoffrey Rush. As part of his royal duties, Prince Albert is required to speak at public events, a task made all the more difficult owing to his severe stammer. The death of his father and subsequent abdication of his older brother means that "Bertie" is to be crowned king. programme.desc: According to legend, Sir Simon de Canterville drowned his wife Lady Eleanor in the lake of Canterville Chase and for hundreds of years the nobleman's ghost has been cursed to haunt the manor. Daughter Virginia makes her displeasure about the move clear and she forges a pact with Sir Simon to scare her parents back to America. programme.title: Secrets of Success: Toto Wolff
programme.desc: Nasser Hussain meets Mercedes team principal Toto Wolff to find out how he steered the German manufacturer to eight F1 constructors' and seven drivers' championships.

programme.title: Bahrain F1 GP Highlights
programme.desc: Formula 1 in 2024 is a go as the Bahrain Grand Prix starts here. 57 laps of Bahrain International Circuit in Sakhir will decide the winner of the opening race of the season. (02.03).

programme.title: PGA Tour Golf Highlights
